roleset.name: damage slightly

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The federal response to California's earthquake crisis was marred [*]by coast-to-coast name-calling between the White House and San Francisco's Mayor Art Agnos.
example.arg: The federal response to California's earthquake crisis
coast-to-coast name-calling between the White House and San Francisco's Mayor Art Agnos.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: His handsomeness was marred by lips slightly too big for his face
example.arg: by lips slightly too big for his face

roleset.note: MAR-V NOTES: Only use arg2 when arg0 is also present. (from mar.01-v)
